pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access and Use Spain Government's API // Functions intended to work with the API of the Spain Government https://datos.gob.es/en/apidata that allows you to download, analyze and generate information through datasets obtained from the API. The API containing information about multiples topics from the municipalities and organizations of Spain, it is possible to find URIs corresponding to the primary sector taxonomy and the identification of geographical coverage defined in Annexes IV and V https://www.boe.es/diario_boe/txt.php?id=BOE-A-2013-2380 (NTI).
